No chocolate covered candy hearts to give away

No song to sing

No flowers bloom

name
Love In Your Eyes
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric
I feel a presence in the air of something special
something rare.
Love in your eyes is the reason why
Holding the secret's a certain prize.
Love in your eyes is the flame
that makes me feel so warm inside.
Were silent wishes to be heard
it would express that single word.
Love in your eyes is the reason why . . .
It suddenly takes you by the hand
And leads you through the promised land.
Is this really happening to me and you?
A thousand words could not describe
this precious way I feel alive.
Love in your eyes is the reason why . . .
Build your love on a strong foundation
And you will feel the sweet sensation.

name
I Don't Remember
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric
Was a time when you were on my mind
Your image then was easier to find
No matter where the place
I often saw your face
Now I feel that something's changed

There was a time when we were ever knew
The laughing then was easier to do
But something felt away
And now I find today
It's not the same

I don't remember your feeling
I don't remember our dream
I don't remember the songs you gave me
Was it as right as it seemed

Now I see that life remains the same
And I don't mind the days alone again
And now that I have found
My feet back on the ground
I've turned around

name
Wings of Love
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric
Fly to me
Fly to me
On the wings of love
Fly to me
They will take you through the storm
To the place where you belong
You can find your way back home
On the wings of love

Can't you see
Can't you see
How the wings of love
Can set you free
From the secrets in your mind
To a place that we can find
Come back to this heart of mine
On the wings of love

On the wings of love
We can turn back again
To the place where love was born
And the wings of love
They can carry us on
To a time where pain is gone

Wait for me
Wait for me
Through the wings of love
You will see
That I need your love tonight
To feel you by my side
And together we can hide
In the wings of love

On the wings of love
We can turn back again
To the place where love was born
And the wings of love
They can carry us on
To a time where pain is gone

Fly to me
Fly to me
On the wings of love
Fly to me

name
THE RIGHT TO SING
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric



The right to sing,
The right to play,
The right to do the things I feel in my own way,
And if you took it all and asked me to pretend,
You'd be breaking a heart that won't mend.

The right to win,
The right to lose.
The right to fall in love with anyone I choose.
And when it's my mistake and everything goes wrong,
I would write what I feel in a song.

They know it all,
Where is the answer?
They can only see what's down in black and white.
Back to the wall,
Just a romancer,
To sing and play my music is my life.
The right to laugh,
The right to dream,
The right to know that people say just what they mean.
And if it turns out that my hopes were not to be,
Then there's no one to blame, only me.


The right to live,
The right to breathe,
The right to stand by all the things that I believe.
Can't say I know it all, but someone has to try,
I will stand or I will fall, live or die,
I will stand or I will fall, live or die.

name
Miracle Of Love
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric
How many sorrows
Do you try to hide
In a world of illusion
That's covering your mind?
I'll show you something good
Oh I'll show you something good.
When you open your mind
You'll discover the sign
That there's something
You're longing to find...
The miracle of love
Will take away your pain
When the miracle of love
Comes your way again.
Cruel is the night
That covers up your fears.
Tender is the one
That wipes away your tears.
There must be a bitter breeze
They say the greatest coward
Can hurt the most ferociously.
But I'll show you something good.
Oh I'll show you something good.
If you open your heart
You can make a new start
When your crumbling world falls apart.
(Chorus repeats...)

I REALLY DON'T WANT TO KNOW
singer
é™ˆæ·‘æ¡¦
lyric
'Cause I really don't want to know

How many arms have held you
And hated to let you go
How many, how many, I wonder
'Cause I really don't want to know

Oh how many lips have kissed you
And set your soul aglow
How many, how many I wonder
But I really don't want to know

So always make me wonder
Aways make me guess
And even, even if I ask you
Oh darling don't confess

Just let it remain your secret
Oh darling I love you so
No wonder,
No wnder,no wonder I wonder
Now really don't want to know

no wonder,no wonder I wonder
Now really don't want to know

name
Smoke Gets In Your Eyes
singer
ç½—æ–‡
lyric
They asked me how I knew my true love was true.
Oh,
I of course replied
"something here inside cannot be denied."
They said "someday you'll find all who love are blind."
Oh,When your heart's on fire,
you must realize smoke gets in your eyes
So I chaffed them
and I gaily laughed to think they could doubt my love.
Yet today my love has flown away, I am without my love.
Now laughing friends deride tears I cannot hide. Oh,
So I smile and say
"when a lovely flame dies, smoke gets in your eyes!"
So I chaffed them
and I gaily laughed to think they could doubt my love.
Yet today my love has flown away, I am without my love.
Now laughing friends deride tears I cannot hide. Oh,
So I smile and say
"when a lovely flame dies, smoke gets in your eyes!"
smoke gets in your eyes

smoke gets in your eyes

name
Don't Cry For Me Argentina
singer
é™ˆæ…§å¨´
lyric
é™ˆæ…§å¨´
don't cry for me argentina live

it won't be easy,   you'll think it strange
when i try to explain how i feel
that i still need your love after all that ive done
you wont believe me
all you will see is a girl you once knew
although shes dressed up to the nines
at sixes and sevens with you
i had to let it happen, i had to change
couldnt stay all my life down at heel
looking out of the window, staying out of the sun
so i chose freedom
running around, trying everything new
but nothing impressed me at all
i never expected it to
dont cry for me argentina
the truth is i never left you
all through my wild days
my mad existence
i kept my promise
dont keep your distance
and as for fortune, and as for fame
i never invited them in
though it seemed to the world they were all i desired
they are illusions
they are not the solutions they promised to be
the answer was here all the time
i love you and hope you love me
dont cry for me argentina

dont cry for me argentina
the truth is i never left you
all through my wild days
my mad existence
i kept my promise
dont keep your distance
have i said too much?
theres nothing more i can think of to say to you.
but all you have to do is look at me to know
that every word is true

Are you lonesome tonight
Do you miss me tonight
Are you sorry we drifted apart
Does your memory stray to a bright summer day
When I kissed you and called you sweetheart
Do the chairs in your parlour seem empty and bare
Do you gaze at me there
And picture me there
Is your heart filled with pain
Shall I come back again

Are you lonesome tonight
I wonder if you're lonesome tonight
You know someone said that the world is a stage
And we each must play a part
Faith had me playing in love
With you as my sweetheart
Act one was, when we met
I love you at first glance
You read your kines so cleverly
And never missed a cue
Then came back to
You seemed to change, you acted strange
And why I've never know
Honey you lied, when you said you loved me
And I had no cause to doubt you
But I'd ather go on hearing your lies
Than to go on living without you
Now the stage is bare
And I'm standing there
With emptiness all around
And if you won't come back to me
Then they can bring the curtain down
Is your heart filled with pain
Shall I come back again

nu lu qi li na dao nao mo
ku dai na pa dao pu gu yi jiao
ca ma ma ha qi mu tai ni ma yi nu
hai mi a gu yi sa na yo
wan ji wu du kai wu di niu
wu ya cha na qi nai wo qi na
wu ji gai nao qi na qia gu gai ka tu
ma wu ma nu gai na ya jiao
ca la han niao a su dao
ku dai ku dai wo ka su na pa duo
yu duo ma ni ni duo yo
ku qi a li tao kao
yi ji ya ni kai ta na qiao
sa da ya su gai su apsu nu
wu ya qia duo qi kai ta ga wu gen tai
yi jie nu yao yi dai kao qiao
ca la han niao a su duo
mao dao qi ni tu diao gei ma nai duo
yi ga ma ni ni dao yo
ku qi a li tao kao
ku qi a li tao kao

The people ask me how.
How I've lived till now.
I tell them I don't know.
I guess they understand.

But life began again.
The day you took my hand.

How i've lived till now. I tell them I don't know.

name
A Spaceman Came Travelling
singer
é‚°æ­£å®µ
lyric
A spaceman came travelling on a ship from afar


And over a village he halted his cralt
And it'd hung in the sky like a star

Just likes a star

He followed a light and came down to a bed
Where a mother and child were lying there on a bed
A bright of silver shonee around his head

And he had the face of an angel

And they were afraid

And the stranger spoke,he said "Don't not fear,
I come from a planet a long a long way from here,
And I bring a message for mankind to hear."
And suddenly the sweetest music filled the air

And it went,"La la la....""La la la....""La la la...."
Peace and good will to all men

And love for the child

"La la la....""La la la....""La la la...."

This lovely music went trembling through the ground
And many will waken on hearing that sound
And travellers on the road the village they found

By the light of that ship in the sky that shone all around

And just before dawn at the palling of the sky
The stranger returned and said "Now I must fly,
When two thousand years of your time has gone by,

This song will begin once again,

To a baby's cry."

And it went,"La la la....""La la la....""La la la...."
Peace and good will to all men

And love for the child

"La la la....""La la la....""La la la...."

Peace and good will to all men

And love for the child

"La la la....""La la la....""La la la...."

Peace and good will to all men

And love for the child

lyric

And I choke on my reply
I'd rather hurt you honestly
than missed you with a lie

on what you say or do

to see the real you
